actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of additional compensation at the so-called "K rate" to a veteran with a service-connected disability who has suffered the loss or loss of one lung or one kidney.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of additional wartime disability compensation to veterans who have suffered the loss or loss of use of a lung or kidney as the result of service-connected disability.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of additional compensation at the so-called "K rate" to a veteran with a service-connected disability who has suffered the loss or loss of one lung or one kidney.
